text: Giovanni Filippo Galvagno, c. 1850 Giovanni Filippo Galvagno (1801 – 1874) was an Italian lawyer and politician. He served in the Chamber of Deputies and Senate of the Kingdom of Sardinia. He was mayor of Turin under the Kingdom of Italy. ==References== Category:Italian lawyers Category:19th-century Italian politicians Category:Mayors of Turin Category:Deputies of Legislature I of the Kingdom of Sardinia Category:Deputies of Legislature III of the Kingdom of Sardinia Category:Deputies of Legislature IV of the Kingdom of Sardinia Category:Deputies of Legislature V of the Kingdom of Sardinia Category:Deputies of Legislature VI of the Kingdom of Sardinia Category:Members of the Senate of the Kingdom of Sardinia Category:1801 births Category:1874 deaths
title: Giovanni Filippo Galvagno
